issue.title: [C++] [Dataset] Write dataset with scanner does not support async scan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The file system write uses the legacy Scan method which is not supported by the async scanner.  This should be addressed.  It would be useful, for example, when copying a dataset from S3 to local disk.
